subject: All tests run when trying to run one test
msgSnippet: I m using JUnit4 inside Eclipse 3.2.2. When I tell it to run a single test, it will instead run all of the tests in the class up to and including the one I
messageBody:
I'm using JUnit4 inside Eclipse 3.2.2. When I tell it to run a single
test, it will instead run all of the tests in the class up to and
including the one I want, but will only give the results of the one I
specified.

This is fine for my normal unit tests, but I also use JUnit for my
integration tests, and some of those tests can take some time to
complete. If I choose to run a test that is physically near the bottom
of the class, it can take minutes before it will run my test.

Is there a way to really make it only run the one test you specify?
